html:
Hey {to.name},

Thank you for reaching out to us with your support request regarding: '{subject}'.

Your issue has been forwarded to our development team for investigation. We understand how important this is and will aim to resolve the issue as soon as possible.

{text}

Best regards,

The MyOrderApp Support Team
